title: 'RHOC' Star Meghan Edmonds Speaks Out For First Time Amid Divorce From Jim Edmonds
text:
“Real Housewives of Orange County” star Meghan Edmonds is speaking about her split from Jim Edmonds for the first time.

Meghan posted a quote on social media that read, “When you’re in a dark place, you sometimes tend to think you’ve been buried. Perhaps you’ve been planted. Bloom.”

She captioned the post, “I’m speaking out.”

She quickly received support from her famous friends including Savannah Chrisley, who said, “We love you ❤️”

Former “RHOC” star Heather Dubrow commented “Stay strong.”

The post comes days after Jim reportedly filed for divorce from Meghan. The reality star would insinuate Jim cheated with their nanny, Carly Wilson

View photos

Both Jim and Wilson have denied the allegations. Wilson posted on social media, “In the past week, allegations have been made about me which are not based in fact. I have not and never would participate in any action involving infidelity. I consider this a private matter in someone else’s marriage and will not comment on it further. I wish the entire family well.💛💛💛 #BeKind”

Meghan and Jim got married back in October 2014. She would join the cast of “Real Housewives of Orange County” in 2015.

View photos

The two appeared on the reality show from season 10-12. Meghan came back this season as a guest of the Housewives.

Following her departure from the reality show, Jim has been accused of cheating with another woman.

Earlier this year, Jim was accused of sending an XXX video to a mistress while Meghan was in the hospital giving birth to their twins.
